Name: Spring
Text: spring: mild (hot if weather is harsh)
Time to plant seeds and tend to livestock.
Time to plant seeds and tend to livestock.

Name: Summer
Text: summer: Hot (double up on one action)
Work slows down in the heat.

Name: Summer
Text: The weather is warm and life is good.

Name: Autumn
Text: autumn: mild (cold if weather is harsh)
Winters are cold and difficult to survive.

Name: Build
Text: Begin the construction of an available building/location when used. Flip it back-side-up and place it in front of you.
Use any number of times per turn

Name: Farm
Text: spring: plant 4 grain (tools 6 grain) on Farm when used
summer: harvest 2 grain (tools 3 grain) and discard the rest when used
autumn: harvest 4 grain (tools 6 grain) on Farm when used
winter: discard all grain on Farm

Name: Vegetable Field
Text: spring: plant 3 vegetables (tools 4 vegetables) on Vegetable Field when used
winter: discard all vegetables on Farm

Name: Orchard
Text: spring: add 1 fruit to Orchard for each tree (passive)
spring, summer: plant 2 trees (tools 3 trees) on Orchard when used (limit 8)
autumn: harvest up to 6 fruit (tools 8 fruit) on Orchard when used
winter: discard all fruit on Orchard (passive)

Name: Fishing Nets
Text: collect up to 4 fish (tools 6 fish) in nets when used

Name: Sheep Pasture
Text: spring, summer, autumn: (grain) +2 sheep when used if less than 2 on Pasture
spring: (grain) +1 sheep (passive) if at least 2 on Pasture
winter: +1 wool on Pasture for each sheep (passive)
spring, summer: collect 3 wool (tools 6 wool) on Pasture when used
remove some number of sheep for +1 meat (tools +2 meat) each when used

Name: Pig Pasture
Text: spring, summer, autumn: (grain) +2 pigs when used if less than 2 on Pasture
spring: (grain) +1 pig (passive) if at least 2 on Pasture
remove some number of pigs for +2 meat (tools +3 meat) each when used
spring: (grain) +2 cows (passive) if at least 2 on Pasture
spring, summer, autumn: (graingrain) +2 cows on Pasture when used if less than 2 on Pasture
optionally remove some cows for +2 meat (tools +3 meat) each when used

Name: Hunting Cabin
Text: spring, summer, autumn: +4/3/1/0 meat (tools +5/4/2/1 meat) in tier 1/2/3/4 when used
winter: +3/2/0/0 meat (tools +4/3/1/0 meat) in tier 1/2/3/4 when used

Name: Smithy
Demand: 2 metal -> +2 tools (+5 tools instead with tools)

Name: Shanties
Text: 2 population are sheltered from mild weather (passive)
(kindling) 2 population are sheltered from cold (can survive cold weather) when used

Name: Wood Cottages
Text: 3 population are sheltered from mild weather (passive)
(kindlingkindling) 3 population are sheltered from cold (can survive cold weather) when used

Name: Stone Cottages
Text: 3 population are sheltered from mild weather (passive)
(kindling) 3 population are sheltered from cold (can survive cold weather) when used

Name: Wood Estates
Text: 5 population are sheltered from mild weather (passive)
(kindlingkindlingkindling) 5 population are sheltered from cold (can survive cold weather) when used

Name: Stone Estates
Text: 5 population are sheltered from mild weather (passive)
(kindling) 5 population are sheltered from cold (can survive cold weather) when used
place under one agricultural location - affects only that location
spring: +2 grain (tools +3 grain) planted on Farm (passive)
spring: +1 vegetable (tools +2 vegetables) planted on Vegetable Field (passive)
population immune to hot weather when used. No doubling up required on Water Tower.
with irrigation, food locations immune to drought when used
with irrigation, food locations immune to drought (passive)

Name: Resource Market
Text: a visitor may purchase 1 stored good when used
stored goods have increased value (+1 Prosperity)

Name: Consumer Market
Text: a visitor may purchase 1 stored good when used
stored goods have increased value (+1 Prosperity)

Name: Agricultural Market
Text: a visitor may purchase 1 stored good when used
stored goods have increased value (+1 Prosperity)

Name: Marketplace
Demand: 1 wood, 1 stone, 1 metal, 1 kindling, 1 clothing, 1 bread, 1 grain, 1 tool, 1 jewelry
Text: a visitor may purchase 1 stored good when used
replaces previous Market buildings if owned
stored goods have increased value (+1 Prosperity)

Name: Caravansary
Text: use up to 2 caravans on markets when used
caravans can purchase up to 3 goods at reduced value (-1 Prosperity to seller)

Name: Trade Pier
Text: use up to 3 ships on markets when used
ships can purchase up to 5 goods at reduced value (-1 Prosperity to seller)

Name: Fairground
Text: spring: Set up Fair when used. Add 1 Prosperity token. Owner only.
summer: If Fair is set up, attend Fair for +4 Prosperity when used

Name: Winery
Text: winter, educated: (fruit) Add 5 \wine wine to Winery when used
summer: Collect all wine on Winery (passive)

Name: Large Winery
Text: winter, educated: (fruitfruit) Add 10 \wine wine to Large Winery when used
summer: Collect all wine on Large Winery (passive)
discard only 1 per turn when consumed
discard only 1 per turn when consumed

Name: Mild First Year
Text: In the first year of your village life, the weather is perfect.
Reshuffle the Town deck next turn

Name: County Fair
Text: Residents from all over the county flock to town for the fair.
+1 Prosperity per sold good this turn

Name: Blight
Text: Grain crops are devastated as a blight spreads over the farms in the region.
spring: Plant 50% less grain on Farms
summer, autumn: remove 50% of grain from Farms.

Name: Harsh weather
Text: The current season is harsh and you struggle to survive.
spring: weather becomes Hot (one worker doubles up)
summer: Hot weather becomes Sweltering: all tasks require 2 population to complete
winter: Cold weather becomes Frigid: housing supports one fewer population

Name: Mild weather
Text: The current season is mild and you take advantage of the weather.

Name: Drought
Text: The riverbeds become cracked and dry. Water is scarce this season.
Negate all bonuses from irrigation without water access
summer: remove 50% of fruit on Orchards

Name: Fire
Text: A wildfire rages, destroying everything it in its path.
summer: without improved access to water, lose all Farms
summer: without improved access to water, lose all Orchards

Name: Disease
Text: An outbreak of a particularly nasty disease in town spreads to those villages that are unprepared.
Any starving village gets 1 diseased population
Any village without a Physician gets 1 diseased population

Name: Town Demand
Demand: 1 wood, 1 stone, 1 metal, 1 kindling, 1 clothing, 1 bread, 1 grain, 1 tool, 1 jewelry, 1 wine, 1 cream, 1 pastry
Text: Remove goods after every trade phase
